resources.string: Enter a name for the preset
Enter the text you want to save
You currently don\'t have any presets saved.\nClick the button below to make one!
You don\'t have any presets saved.
The message isn\'t scheduled for the future!
Something went wrong with that contact.
Click to send your group message
Click to send your picture message
You can only send picture messages to one recipient at a time.
Some tips to get you started:
Future Messenger created and developed by:
You can schedule basic SMS text messages, group MMS text messages, and picture messages.

If you request a text message be sent to more than one recipient, you can choose from two delivery methods. You can send each message \"individually,\" where every recipient gets an independent copy of the message as if you sent it to them one-on-one. Alternatively, you can select the \"group\" option to send the message as a group MMS, where all recipients can participate in a single conversation with yourself and each other. All messages and replies in this conversation are visible to every recipient.

If you schedule a group MMS text message or a picture message, Future Messenger will push a notification at the time you specified. Click this notification and choose which app you would like to use to send the message. Future Messenger will build your message in the chosen app as you saved it, so all you have to do is hit send!

We all get tired of typing from time to time. If you find yourself typing a certain message often, you can create a preset for it! Once you have a preset saved, you can use it to help you fill in the text field of messages as you\'re editing or drafting them. (That\'s what the \"Populate from Preset\" button is for!) You can even chain multiple presets together—try it out!
Future Messenger is a pre-scheduled messaging utility that allows you to schedule your messages ahead of time.

If you schedule a text message for one recipient or specify multiple recipients to receive a text message \"individually,\" Future Messenger will automatically send the message and notify you upon doing so.
Are you sure you want to exit without saving?
